sen.j: 細川 師氏（ほそかわ もろうじ、正安6年（1305年） - 正平 (日本)3年/貞和4年（1348年））は、鎌倉時代後期から南北朝時代 (日本)の武将。
sen.e: Morouji HOSAKAWA (1305 - 1348) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the late Kamakura period thru the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).
Morouji HOSAKAWA (1305 - 1348) was a busho (Japanese military commander) during the late Kamakura period through the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).

sen.j: 兄弟に細川和氏・細川頼春。
sen.e: He had an elder brother Kazuuji HOSOKAWA and a younger Yoriharu HOSOKAWA.

sen.j: 元弘の乱では足利尊氏に従い、倒幕に参加。
sen.e: During the Genko War, he fought under the command of Takauji ASHIKAGA to overthrow the Shogunate.

sen.j: 建武政権では尊氏の弟である直義に随行して鎌倉へ下り、中先代の乱でも戦う。
sen.e: Under the Kenmu Government, he accompanied Takauji's brother Naoyoshi to Kamakura and fought the Nakasendai War as well.
Under the Kenmu Government, he accompanied Takauji's brother Naoyoshi to Kamakura and fought the Nakasendai War as well.
sen.cmt: and の前の空白を半角分削除しました。

sen.j: 室町幕府成立後、淡路守護に任じられ、南朝方の宇原氏を征討した（立河瀬合戦）。
sen.e: When the Muromachi Government was established, he was appointed to the position of Awaji no kami and defeated the Ohara clan of the Southern Court (Tatekawase Battle).

When the Muromachi Government was established, he was appointed to the position of Awaji shugo (the Provincial Constable of Awaji Province) and defeated the Uhara clan of the Southern Court (Tatekawase Battle).
sen.cmt: 「淡路守護」の部分が誤訳です。登録されている定訳通りに訂正しました。 「宇原氏」の読みは「うはら」ではないのでしょうか。念のため訂正しました。また、「立河瀬」の読み方が正しいかどうかも不明です。
sen.e: When the Muromachi Government was established, he was appointed to the position of Awaji shugo (the Provincial Constable of Awaji Province) and defeated the Uhara clan of the Southern Court (Tatekawase Battle).

sen.j: 以後師氏の子孫が淡路守護を務める（淡路守護家）。
sen.e: After that time, Morouji's descendants kept the position of Awaji shugo (the Provincial Constable of Awaji Province).
After that time, Morouji's descendants kept the position of Awaji shugo (the shugo family of Awaji province).
sen.cmt: 「淡路守護」の注釈はすでに前文で出ているので、ここでは注釈を削除しました。また、最後のカッコ内の「淡路守護家」の訳が抜けていたので追加しました。
sen.e: After that time, Morouji's descendants kept the position of Awaji shugo (the shugo family of Awaji province).
